website_summaries.verdict: Safely designed to be easy to use, transport, and store when not in use.
pros: Designed to fold up easily in three steps
Safety brake keeps the stroller from moving when you are stopped
Brake automatically engages when handle is released
Tubular steel frame is durable but still more lightweight than other models
cons: Some customers say that the wheels are best suited for pavement only

customer_reviews.title: Easy to collapse
customer_reviews.text: I have 19 month twins and 5 month singleton so I needed this for outings. Had to take the breaks of because any weight made them rub the tires. Easy to collapse. Had to rearrange car seats because it wouldn't fit unless we had a seat folded down in our 3 row suv
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad brakes
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered 2 of these already, hoping the first was just a fluke. Nope. The first and the replacement both had brakes that didn't work. Trying to push 3 kids in one stroller with faulty brakes is a miserable day experience. I will return this one, and I will order another stroller, just not this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M. Fries

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect. I have 6 month old twins plus a ...
customer_reviews.text: For what it's supposed to do, it's perfect. I have 6 month old twins plus a toddler and everyone can ride comfortably. It has a built in handle brake and turntable wheels. Most triple strollers are joggers with no turntable wheels or your toddler rides on a platform. With this stroller, everyone has a seat. It's perfect for neighborhood walks.
customer_reviews.author: NMN_TX

customer_reviews.title: Stroller is not terrible, but definitely get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Stroller is not terrible, but definitely get what you pay for. The braking system is terrible and I had to call the manufacturer to get new brake parts. It took for ever and I ended up sending the stroller back. This stroller is hard to steer and would only recommended use for very straight and smooth paths... Maybe a mall is best for a stroller like this. Not good for outside use.
customer_reviews.author: Sparrtan

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and roomy stroller
customer_reviews.text: I use this product daily to take the three little toddlers I babysit for walks. It has earned the nickname the "Big Lebowski" because it's such a large stroller and it drifts a little to the left.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over all we love it we have adopted 4 very small children and ...
customer_reviews.text: kinda heavy and hard for my wife to lift by herself. Over all we love it we have adopted 4 very small children and we will be getting or moneys worth out of it!
customer_reviews.author: rob-idaho

customer_reviews.title: Broken tire
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item and 3 months later the front tire fell off. I am trying to locate a replacement, not sure if anyone knows where I can order one as I threw away the box and paperwork it came with. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Tumlinson

customer_reviews.title: Great price good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we needed We were surprised at the good quality for the price. We are very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Joyce R

customer_reviews.title: brake bug
customer_reviews.text: one of the brake paddings hits the tire making it so hard to push.
customer_reviews.author: christine kafont

customer_reviews.title: people do not like the fact that you have to hold the break ...
customer_reviews.text: As mentioned, people do not like the fact that you have to hold the break bar down. We solved this by simply wrapping a strip of velcro around it and that solved the inconvenience. We did notice the breaks began to rub against the wheels, so we just took those off and that was also a real simply fix (the break bar on the rear wheels still functions without these). This was a great stroller for the cost and fit in our van and wasn't overly heavy. Unfortunately the rear axle broke after 3 months of use. Thankfully it had a 1-year warranty and so we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: beanielou

product_meta.title: Child Craft Sport Multi-Child Triple Stroller, Regatta Blue
product_meta.description: This multi-passenger stroller features a canopy for sun protection, easy to clean fabric, and extra-large storage baskets. All seats have an adjustable 5-point harness and recline to accommodate infants. Rubber, shock absorbing foam wheels provide a comfortable ride. Stroller features in-line stadium design to maximize child visibility, to enable interaction with their environment and to ease maneuverability. For added safety, the safe-break system engages when the stroller handle is released.
feature_bullets: Multi-child stroller accommodates 3 children up to 40 pounds each
Folds easily and quickly for storage and transport
Safe break system engages when handle is released

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars23 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
